name: Star Revenge 3: Mario on an Saoire
summary:
Star Revenge 3: Mario on an Saoire (formerly called Mario on an Saoire 64) is a ROM hack made by BroDute. It was released on September 20, 2013 and contains 65 stars.

On November 20, 2018, this hack got a remake: Star Revenge 3.5: Vacation of Cursed Dreams.
